Tablet: (PROPHET)

Description:
Game 1953 - KGB Unleashed, developed by studio Phantomery Interactive - this tense and atmospheric adventure in the first person , what is happening in the depths of the Soviet bunker during the "cold war." Players will discover a dark and terrible secrets hidden inside the bunker while trying to overcome his own paranoia. What kind of voices around - reality or a hallucination ? Will you get to the surface again and see the sunshine, or you are hopelessly enclosed in a dark creepy dungeon prisoner ?

The answers you will find only in 1953 - KGB Unleashed!

1953 - KGB Unleashed is based on real experiments conducted by the Committee of State Security of the USSR. In those days, there were experiments to study the limits of human endurance , the ability of telepathy and the impact of fear on the human brain. Realistic visual style 1953 - KGB Unleashed brings back to life the era of the Soviet Union 50's : the interior of an underground shelter recreated through real Soviet military plans and drawings and found materials are based on historically accurate instruments.

Explore the secret laboratory where experiments were conducted classified . Find out the truth about the terrible events that led to the closure of the project and the elimination of all those who worked on it . Everything is steeped in the atmosphere of isolation and anxiety : you have to meet face to face with their fears , while invisible "observer " communicates with you via the internal communication system . Who is he - friend or foe? During your quest you will learn about the hidden potential of the human mind - but if you can then stay alive ?
